meanings.definition: Break down or dissolve (cells or tissues) by the action of their own enzymes.
meanings.sent1: The fruit autolysed quickly, turning into mush.
meanings.sent2: The enzymes autolysed the proteins in the cell.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria autolysed the leftovers, creating a stinky mess.
meanings.sent4: Over time, the old building autolysed into a pile of rubble.
meanings.sent5: The rain autolysed the paper, causing it to disintegrate.

meanings.sent1: The autolysed cells were no longer viable.
meanings.sent2: The autolysed tissue showed signs of degradation.
meanings.sent3: The autolysed meat had a strange texture.
meanings.sent4: The autolysed leaves crumbled at the touch.
meanings.sent5: The autolysed vegetables had a strong odor.
